goal: What's the next open weekend (Sat/Sun) on my calendar? For that weekend, book me a round-trip flight from Washington (DCA) to Boston (BOS). I'll also need two rides: one to DCA for my departure and one from Logan Airport to the Omni Parker House hotel when I land. Finally, block off that entire weekend on my calendar as 'Boston Getaway'.

evals.description: Verify the origin and destination airports of the booked round-trip flight.
